Html:
FYI.

I have donwloaded the samples this morning using the Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework Sample Browser. During the donload I got this alert from Microsoft Security Essentials

Microsoft Security Essentials

Virus: VBS/Ramnit.B

 Category: Virus

Description:

This program is dangerous and replicates by infecting other files.

Recommended action:

Remove this software immediately.

 

Items:

file:E:\AllInOneCodeFramework\Visual Studio 2010\Insert-Update-Delete-in-61a43cd1\C#\SilverlightWCFDatagridSample.Web\SilverlightWCFDatagridSampleTestPage.html
